publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4227 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Beith Juniors FC—That the Parliament congratulates Beith Juniors Football Club, the players, fans and everyone connected with the club on winning the New Coin Automatics West of Scotland Cup with a 2-1 victory over Auchinleck Talbot at Newlandsfield Park on Saturday 23 May 2009; believes that Beith’s players are a shining exam ple of hard work and determination; acknowledges that much of the credit for Beith Juniors’ success must also go to manager Johnny Millar in his first season in charge; considers a victory in this massive competition to be a perfect ending to an incredible season, and wishes The Mighty all the very best in future cam paigns. Supported by : Aileen Cam pbell*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, John Lam ont*, Stewart Maxwell*
S3M-4227 Congratulations to Beith Juniors FC (lodged on 26 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Ross Finnie*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-4227 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Beith Juniors FC—That the Parliament congratulates Beith Juniors Football Club, the players, fans and everyone connected with the club on winning the New Coin Automatics West of Scotland Cup with a 2-1 victory over Auchinleck Talbot at Newlandsfield Park on Saturday 23 May 2009; believes that Beith’s players are a shining example of hard work and determination; acknowledges that much of the credit for Beith Juniors’ success must also go to manager Johnny Millar in his first season in charge; considers a victory in this massive competition to be a perfect ending to an incredible season, and wishes The Mighty all the very best in future campaigns. Supported by: Aileen Campbell, Bill Kidd, Alasdair Allan, John Lamont, Stewart Maxwell, Jamie Hepburn, Ross Finnie, Sandra White, Gil Paterson
S3M-4227 Congratulations to Beith Juniors FC (lodged on 26 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4227 Congratulations to Beith Juniors FC (lodged on 26 May 2009) Jamie McGrigor*
